title: In Time of Illness

lyrics.text:
Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world, have mercy on us.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world, have mercy on us.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world, grant us your peace. Amen.

author: Georgia Harkness (20th century)
